violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Сергей' at 0:05.988-0:07.408. Operator responded with 'Чем могу помочь?' at 0:07.748 without repeating the name back or requesting confirmation ('Верно?'). Echo method requires: (1) repeat contact data, (2) ask for confirmation, (3) receive confirmation. None of these steps were performed.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for customer name
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides their name, immediately repeat it back and ask for confirmation: 'Сергей, верно?' or 'Правильно я вас поняла, Сергей?' This ensures accurate data capture and shows attentiveness.

coaching_priorities.issue: Customer name not used during conversation
coaching_priorities.recommendation: Use customer's name periodically throughout the call to build rapport. Example: 'Сергей, я нашла информацию' instead of just 'Я нашла информацию'.
Maintain formal address throughout. At 0:44, operator said 'я тебе посмотрю' (informal). Should consistently use 'вам' (formal) in all customer interactions.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name '74 Колесами', operator name 'Александра', and request for customer name. Closing includes 'Чем-то ещё могу помочь?' Minor informal address 'тебе' at 0:44 noted but not severe enough for violation.
7.1.note: One instance of informal 'тебе' usage - coaching opportunity

7.2.evidence: Customer name 'Сергей' collected at 0:05.988 without echo confirmation
7.2.note: Critical violation - operator must repeat contact data and request confirmation

7.3.note: Outro timing cannot be determined without explicit call end timestamp

7.4.evidence: No overlapping speech patterns detected in transcript timestamps

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s. Customer remained engaged throughout call.

9.1.evidence: Primary search duration 19.64s (from 0:18.168 to 0:37.808), well under 40s threshold
9.1.note: Multiple brief searches performed, all under 20 seconds

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer with 'Благодарю вас за ожидание' at 0:37.808 after search

3.1.evidence: Customer request for stamped disks fully addressed: product found, price provided (5470 rubles), availability confirmed (day after tomorrow), location given, article number provided

3.6.evidence: Operator checked system multiple times before providing information ('Сейчас посмотрю', 'на складе ли она')

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: price, availability, delivery date (6th), location (Василия Васильева), article number (R3000-64), color (black)

10.2.evidence: Logical script flow with proper greeting, needs identification, information search, and assistance offer

10.3.evidence: Good dialogue management overall, conversation flowed naturally
10.3.note: Operator did not use customer name 'Сергей' during conversation - missed rapport-building opportunity

10.6.evidence: Accurate and complete information delivered with confidence

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal

1.1.evidence: No profanity or rudeness detected in transcript

4.1.evidence: Customer was polite and cooperative throughout
4.1.note: No difficult customer behavior to handle

positive_observations: Excellent greeting with all required elements (company name, operator name, customer name request)
Professional search behavior with announcements ('Сейчас посмотрю')
Thanked customer for waiting after search
Efficient information search (19.6 seconds, well under threshold)
Complete and accurate information provided (price, availability, location, article number)
Professional closing with offer for additional help
Patient and thorough explanation of product availability and delivery timeline

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for precise echo method analysis. Clean transcript with clear speaker diarization.
